jobTitle: Demand and Supply Planner - Remote | WFH
description:
Are you a numbers wizard with a passion for planning?

We're looking for a talented Demand and Supply Planner to join our team. This is a fully remote role where you'll play a crucial part in balancing supply and demand to keep our business running smoothly.

What You'll Do

Forecast demand and optimize inventory levels.

Collaborate with sales, marketing, and operations teams.

Manage order scheduling and allocation.

Analyze data to identify trends and improve processes.

Resolve supply chain issues and implement solutions.

What You'll Need

At least 5 years of experience in supply chain or demand planning.

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

Proficiency in Excel and ERP systems (NetSuite preferred).

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

The ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment.

What We Offer

A competitive salary and benefits package.

The opportunity to work remotely and have a flexible schedule.

A chance to grow and develop your career.

If you're a strategic thinker with a knack for numbers, we want to hear from you!

Employment Type: Full-Time
